programme.title: Bargain Mansions

programme.desc: Mina and Karen find that "you get what you pay for" when they buy a bargain house for $5,000.

programme.title: Basketball Stories
programme.desc: The untold stories behind the 1989-92 Portland Trail Blazers -- a small market team that defied expectations and made two NBA Finals.

programme.title: The Dream Team
programme.desc: The story behind the historic Olympic gold medal run of the 1992 USA Men's Basketball team - the greatest team in sports history.

programme.title: NBA TV Film Room

programme.title: NBA Special

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins
programme.desc: It's a big day for Hunter the Sumatran Tiger. He is blind and must be sedated for his annual eye check, allowing Terri to get closer than usual. The keepers prepare the young giraffe Scarlett for a road trip to South Australia, reuniting her with family.

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert follows in Steve's steps wrangling Utah, a highly venomous 12-foot king cobra. Dr. Amber visits Tandora to care for wild Koalas. Back at the Zoo, an old injury flares up for Bruce the Brolga, a bird who's been in the Irwin's care for 26 years.

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck in the Australia Zoo's Mammal Department as Rosie the Giraffe is ready to give birth. Robert has a bloody encounter with a wild python that's entered an enclosure, and Terri helps the keepers wrangle Chief the Tasmanian Devil.

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins
programme.desc: While Bindi and the keepers ready Sophie the baby giraffe for her first steps into her enclosure, Robert helps to hand-raise another baby: Melman the kangaroo. Terri oversees a health check for one of the zoo's favourite characters, Ravi the red panda.

programme.title: Crikey! It's the Irwins

programme.desc: Terri attends Charlie the tiger's exam to determine if his tumours were successfully treated. Bindi and the Small Mammal Team help develop a vaccine for Eden the Tasmanian devil.

programme.desc: Single mom Maggie is facing Christmas alone until Lucas crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest. Together they overcome Christmas while finding comfort in their growing bond.

programme.title: Heart of the Holidays
programme.desc: A career-driven woman returns to her hometown for the holidays and faces her high-school boyfriend. Together, they rediscover what matters most in life.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: A hotel manager returns home to help her sister plan her wedding. She must work together with the current owner of the inn her family used to own to plan the perfect day for her sister.

programme.title: Holly and Ivy
programme.desc: After her neighbour's illness returns, a woman looks for someone to renovate her house so she can adopt her children.

programme.title: Holiday Hearts
programme.desc: A woman is forced to help care for her friend’s daughter, with the help of a friend. Along the way, the two of them find not only the Christmas spirit, but also, love.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas
programme.desc: Two people find their paths continuing to cross over the holidays at Martha's Vineyard.

programme.title: A Gingerbread Romance
programme.desc: An architect and her team enter a contest to build a life-size gingerbread house. When her baker falls through, she is forced to outsource to a local bakery and instantly falls for the baker, a single dad, and they spend the holidays together.

programme.title: Catch a Christmas Star
programme.desc: When a pop star reunites with her first love, the pressures of the spotlight could threaten their budding romance.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: A woman heads off to Montana before the holidays to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas
programme.desc: A girl tells Santa she wants a boyfriend for Christmas, years later, her wish comes true.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: An artist is forced to put her life on hold and return home to help her family. While at home, she finds herself working closely with her high-school sweetheart who is desperately searching for a home for his school's Christmas dance.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman must choose between moving across the country for her dream job or staying in her hometown to marry the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Project Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A woman plays the small-town Santa and makes holiday wishes come true. This year, she finds not only is she able to help others, she is also able to help herself.

programme.title: Deliver by Christmas
programme.desc: A bakery owner is enchanted by a mystery client whom she has never met.

programme.title: Swept Up by Christmas
programme.desc: An antique seller and a cleaner clash over how to downsize a magnificent estate right before Christmas. As the two uncover the house’s treasures, they find a way to reconnect the reclusive owner with his own Christmases past.

programme.title: A Merry Christmas Match
programme.desc: A woman lives in a ski village and works at the local antiques shop. One day, the local 'Christmas Catch Ryder' stops by her shop, and sparks fly between them.

programme.title: Nostalgic Christmas
programme.desc: A woman helps her family close their toy-store, but what she finds, inspires an entire town that is in need of some Christmas cheer.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah Davis finds love in an unusual entitled Hollywood star, who visits her family ranch to prepare for a film.

programme.title: Our Christmas Love Song
programme.desc: A country-singer is accused of plagiarizing her holiday single. Because of this, she is forced to return home to spend the holidays with her family, and an old flame that resurfaces in her life.

programme.title: Holiday for Heroes
programme.desc: Worlds suddenly collide for a woman and a soldier who have been exchanging letters for a year finally meet.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown to start life anew with her young daughter. When the young girl has a hard time adjusting, she seeks help.

programme.title: Looks Like Christmas
programme.desc: Two Type-A single parents battle it out for control of the Christmas holiday at their children's middle school, and they find they learn the meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Charming Christmas
programme.desc: The heir to a department store reluctantly agrees to play Mrs. Claus for the stores annual party. She meets the charming, Mr. Claus and learns the true magic of the holidays.

programme.title: The Christmas Doctor
programme.desc: A travelling doctor is assigned to a small clinic for the holidays and is surprised to learn that she feels right at home.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A single mother and her two children move to a small town at Christmastime. Though they are struggling to make ends meet, they find a surprising amount of good fortune and a family secret is revealed.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian Angel Gaby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to help restore it's Christmas Spirit. There she meets a volunteer fire chief that shows her the true meaning of love.

programme.title: USS Christmas
programme.desc: A reporter heads off on a cruise during the holidays where she falls for a naval officer. Together, the two of them must try to solve a mystery found upon the ship.

programme.title: A Homecoming for the Holidays
programme.desc: A country-singer returns home for the holidays and meets her brother's friend, an ex-soldier. While home, she works on her new song, plus, spends time with the friend to help him build a house.

programme.title: A Christmas Love Story
programme.desc: A youth-choir director is tasked with writing the title song for her Christmas Eve show but becomes distracted when a gifted boy joins the choir. Unbeknownst to her, this boy does not tell his widowed father of his plans to sing in the service.

programme.title: A Family Christmas Gift

programme.title: Overhaulin'

programme.title: Overhaulin'

programme.desc: Situation, Pauly D, Snooki and Jwoww road trip down the east coast and the rest of the gang hop on planes to fly south for the winter. They are shocked by the surprise arrival of Angelina and the drama picks up where it left off.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Sammi tries to figure out what Ronnie really did at the club the night before, but no one is saying. And when Angelina interrupts Pauly's game, we see a whole new side of the usually calm Pauly D.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Angelina swallows her pride and apologizes to the girls. Back at the house, Mike, Vinny and Pauly have a close encounter with grenades in the hot tub, while Ron continues to creep behind Sammi's back.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Ron's bad behaviour puts Snooki, Angelina and Jwoww in a tough spot. Together, the girls decide to write an 'anonymous' letter to Sammi and finally reveal the entire truth.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Sammi finds Snooki and Jenni's 'anonymous' letter, and this time it's really over with Ronnie. At least for now. Meanwhile, Mike, Vinny and Pauly (MVP) have their hands full juggling four girls in one night.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The anonymous note causes tension between the girls, culminating in a full-blown catfight. After spending another night in bed with Vinny, Snooki reveals a not-so-little known fact about her pinkeye-prone cuddle-buddy.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The roommates deal with the fallout from the girl fight; Angelina starts dating Jose, a guy from the club; Jenni and Snooki wear homemade haz-mat suits to clean up the smush room in preparation for Snooki's hook-up.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: When news gets out that Angelina and Vinny hooked up, Mike threatens to spill the beans to Jose. Vinny's family comes to visit. Vinny and Pauly find the girls of their dreams, but one of their hearts will be broken.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Things go south for Angelina when the house learns she slept with Jose after smushing Vinny. Then she gets too close to a guy Snooki hooked up with. It's the last straw when Mike discovers more unpleasantness in the bathroom.

programme.title: Rocky

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: In the aftermath of his infamous match with Apollo Creed, Rocky plans to settle down with the love of his life and start a family. He soon finds himself out of money, however, and has no choice but to accept Apollo's offer of a rematch.

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: Three years after beating Apollo Creed, with whom he has become great friends, Balboa loses his title to Clubber Lang, who inadvertently causes the death of Mickey. Apollo helps Rocky train for a rematch against Lang so he can win the title back.

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: When Rocky's old friend Apollo Creed is killed during a fight with a super-fit Russian boxer, Ivan Drago, Rocky blames himself. Rocky arranges to fight Ivan in Russia.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned

programme.title: Outlander

programme.title: Holiday ER
programme.desc: When a man dressed as Santa is near death, his wife asks his doctor for a special favour. A man has a live fish stuck in his throat, an elf is in distress and a boy has a blue leg that defies diagnosis.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: An ER doctor can't figure out why his patient has blue skin. A teen girl has suffered for years with abdominal pains that no doctor can explain. A doctor attempts to keep the lone survivor of a plane crash alive.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A doctor struggles with the decision to revive an older patient after prolonged CPR. Two nurses encounter a stabbing victim on the street and try to save him. A doctor on a cruise ship finds that her dream job has become a nightmare.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A older man's small injury takes an unexpected turn. A juice diet causes major problems for a health enthusiast.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A woman risks losing her finger after trying on an ill-fitting engagement ring. A body builder can't breathe and doctors are shocked to discover why. A doctor takes a break outside and is nearly struck by a car driven by her next patient.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A college student's head is impaled by a trophy deer's antlers. A car crash victim leads the doctor to believe her baby may still be at the accident scene. A nurse's ex-boyfriend brings his new girlfriend to the ER, and the nurse must help save her life.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER

programme.title: Most Terrifying Places in America

programme.title: Most Terrifying Places in America
programme.desc: From a former Victorian-era asylum where victims were experimented on to a remote Nebraska outpost where a scorned woman killed her unfaithful husband, we explore the gravest of locations where the dead never sleep.

programme.title: Most Terrifying Places in America
programme.desc: From a Mississippi bridge where a murderer was hanged for his crimes to Savannah's oldest operating hotel built prior to the Civil War, these terrifying roads and haunted roadside spots will make any driver want to lock the doors and roll up the windows.

programme.title: Most Terrifying Places in America
programme.desc: From a Nebraska road where a farmer hung his entire family to an Upstate New York farmhouse where a demon has long overstayed its welcome, we explore locations linked to unnerving and terrifying tales.

programme.desc: Explore the mysteries and legends surrounding seven spine tingling sites.
